meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>netting</kanji> <kanji>door</kanji> is a <vocabulary>screen door</vocabulary>. Makes sense, right? Screen doors are like little meshy nets made into a door shape.
readingMnemonic: You've seen 網 on its own. We're going to use that reading. Then, add the 戸 reading with rendaku and you have yourself あみど.
